resources.string: This is a proof of concept for a Geo-Contextual Application.The app detects when you enter a Augmented space, causing the phone to Vibrate and instigate a tracking system. This system allows certain parts of the augmented space to have superimpose objects, such as films and 3D models appear on top of them
The app will begin after checking for Augmented spaces. Once it has finished loading a camera screen shall appear, Begin to explore your surrondings using the cameras view.
